enforce_admins.description: Boolean, setting this to `true` enforces status checks for repository administrators.

require_signed_commits.description: Boolean, setting this to `true` requires all commits to be signed with GPG.

required_status_checks.description: Enforce restrictions for required status checks. See [Required Status Checks](#required-status-checks

required_pull_request_reviews.description: Enforce restrictions for pull request reviews. See [Required Pull Request Reviews](#required-pull-request-reviews

restrictions.description: Enforce restrictions for the users and teams that may push to the branch. See [Restrictions](#restrictions
